Name: Training Leah
About the game: After having defeated countless monsters and even some demons, you were gifted a hero's sword that came with a lot of prestige. Along with the prestige came a lot of expectations. Expectations that you want no part in, as you try to live a somewhat safer life without having to fight demons again. With rumors of monsters spawning in the south, you try to make your way north, when a woman named Leah approaches you and asks for your help in saving her village. The game features turn-based strategy combat. Though it is a SRPG, there is no cumbersome level grind or needless filler fights. This doesn't mean the battles are easy, however, as you'll need to carefully plan and strategize how best to utilize those under your command as well as uncontrollable NPCs and how they affect the battlefield. As the plot progresses, your relationship with Leah will also progress. In time, this will lead to romantic and even sexual situations. The game contains fully uncensored adult content.
